Package suncertify.db

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatabaseConstants
    DatabaseConstants contains information relating to the database schema as outlined in the project specification.
    DBMain  
    IDatabase
    This interface extends DBMain interface to provide extra functionality that was not included in the original interface design.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Data
    The Data class implements IDatabase which extends DBMain interface.
    DBFileAccess
    DBFileAccess is responsible for reading and writing records to the database file.
    LockManager
    The LockManager class is responsible for handling multiple concurrent clients accessing the subcontractor records in the cache via Data class.
    SubcontractorCache
    SubcontractorCache is used to store all contractor objects read from the database file in memory.
    SubcontractorRecord
    The SubcontractorRecord class represents a subcontractor record.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DatabaseException
    DatabaseException is the superclass of all exceptions in the suncertify.db package.
    DuplicateKeyException
    The class DuplicateKeyException should be used when a duplicate record is found in the database
    RecordNotFoundException
    The class RecordNotFoundException should be used when a record is not found in the database
